Package index

Metric Ratings

Functions for grabbing metric ratings from various sources

cbd_torvik_ratings()
Year-End T-Rank Ratings
cbd_torvik_ratings_archive()
Day-to-day T-Rank Ratings
cbd_torvik_team_factors()
Four Factor Team Splits
cbd_kenpom_ratings()
Year-End KenPom Ratings
cbd_kenpom_ratings_archive()
Day-to-day KenPom Ratings
cbd_bpi_ratings()
BPI Ratings and ESPN Projections
cbd_all_metrics()
Get T-Rank, WAB, KP, BPI, SOR/SOS, and NET in one tibble
cbd_net_archive()
Daily NET Rankings
cbd_ap_rankings()
AP Poll History

Player Data

Functions for grabbing player-level data

cbd_torvik_player_game()
Barttorvik Player Game Logs
cbd_torvik_player_season()
Barttorvik Player Season Averages
cbd_torvik_player_split()
Barttorvik Player Stat Splits

Team + Conference Data

Functions for grabbing team- and conference-level data

cbd_torvik_team_split()
Barttorvik Team Stat Splits
cbd_torvik_team_history()
Four Factor Team Histories
cbd_torvik_conf_factors()
Four Factor Conference Splits

Functions for grabbing game-level data

cbd_torvik_game_box()
Barttorvik Game Box Stats
cbd_torvik_game_factors()
Barttorvik Game Four Factors
cbd_torvik_game_stats()
Barttorvik Full Game Stats
cbd_torvik_season_schedule()
Barttorvik Season Schedules
cbd_torvik_team_schedule()
Barttorvik Team Season Schedules
cbd_add_net_quad()
Add Net Rankings and Quadrants to Data

Predictions

Functions for running T-Rank predictions and Monte Carlo simulations

T-Rank Game Predictions
cbd_torvik_season_prediction()
T-Rank Season Predictions
cbd_torvik_season_simulation()
T-Rank Season Simulation

Tournament Results + Resumes

Functions for grabbing historical tournament performance and team sheets

cbd_torvik_current_resume()
Get Current Tournament Resumes
cbd_torvik_ncaa_results()
Get NCAA Tournament Results
cbd_torvik_ncaa_sheets()
Get Committee Tournament Sheets
cbd_torvik_resume_database()
Get Selection Sunday Resumes
cbd_torvik_similar_resumes()
Similar Team Resumes
